full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RLUNG RTA'I MCHOD CHOG PHAN BDE'I PADMA DKAR PO'I MDZES RGYAN BUNG BA GZHON NU'I GLU DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,('DI LA RLUNG DANG GLUNG ZHES PA GNYIS YOD PA DON 'DRA DA 'AM, ,GANG LDAN YANG SNGA MA'I YI GE LTAR BYAS TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I CHOG 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS DANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG GYIS CES DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I MOS NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RANG LO NYER BRGYAD LA BABS PA'I NAG ZLA'I YAR TSES BZANG POR CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL KYI RANG GSHAG NAS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD @008B LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM 'GRUB MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DPAR 'DI SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS LEGS BSKRUN PA'I, ,DGE BA GANG DES MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA KUN, ,PHYI NANG GSANG BA'I RLUNG RTA YAR BSKYED NAS, RLUNG SEMS CHOS LA 'BYOR BA'I DBANG THOB SHOG , ,,)
